description_text:

have not received a shipping confirmation or tracking number. When can I
expect them to ship?

Thanks!
Clay

conversations.body_text: Hi Clay,  We have shipped it from our US warehouse today. FedEx tracking number：882143124730

Can you confirm the package has been provided to FedEx? The tracking number
shows they don’t have it yet.



On Thu, Jun 19, 2025 at 12:02 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Clay, ​ Here is your FedEx tracking number: 882143124730, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=882143124730&trkqual=12029~882143124730~FDEG, the expected delivery date: June 26-27 ​
